indicator.summary: Triple EMA Oscillator (TRIX) is the rate of change for a 3 EMA smoothing of the Close price over a lookback window. TRIX is often confused with TEMA. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
Optional. Number of periods for a TRIX SMA signal line.
